ModMetaData.name: Azzy's Weapon Library
ModMetaData.author: AzzyH
ModMetaData.description:
AzzyH的武器库 包含特性：
投射物： -电弧；（电弧将在pawn间连锁传递） -导弹；（导弹将追踪目标） -穿透投射物；（贯通攻击一条直线上的pawn）
动词/弹药系统： -霰弹枪/机枪/可装填动词；（一次性发射多个投射物，连续射击，切换目标，可独立工作，也可与CompAmmo配合使用） -弹药组件；（提供一个简单的弹药系统，但通过不修改其他模组内容且可通过设置关闭，比CE或其他弹药系统更兼容）
多动词系统： -多verb组件；（提供一个框架，使一把武器可包含多个verb，当启用MVCF.Features.Feature_ExtraEquipmentVerbs时此功能不激活）
重型武器系统： -重型武器；（pawn必须穿戴特定装备才能装备重型武器）
hediff炮台： -hediff炮台；（表现和原版炮台comp相近，但可以通过hediff实现动态获取）
IStatable接口： -一个在DefModExtension和VerbProperties中显示自定义信息的接口；
AzzyH's Weapon Library. features contained:
projectile: -arc;(the arc will chains across the pawns) -missile;(missile will tracking target) -piercing projectile;(attack pawns in a straight line)
verb/ammo system: -shotgun/mechinegun/reloadable verb;(shoot multi projectile at one time, continuously shooting, transfer target, can work independtly, also can cooperate with CompAmmo) -ammo comp;(provide a simple ammo system, but more compatible than ce or other ammo system by do not patch other mod's content and can be closed by settings)
multiple verb system: -multi verb comp;(provide a framework that enable multi verbs consisted in a weapon, inactive when MVCF.Features.Feature_ExtraEquipmentVerbs is enabled)
heavy Weapon system: -heavy weapon;(pawn must wear some certain apparels to equip heavy weapon)
hediff turret -hediff turret; (its performance is similar to the vanilla CompTurretGun, but can be add or remove dynamically through hediff.)
IStatable: -a interface to show custom info in DefModExtension and VerbProperties;
